DOC.brief_summary: - Shoulder pain dysfunction common problem overhead sport , due extreme range motion repetitive loading . Predisposing factor include inadequate range motion ( ROM ) , reduction total ROM shift balance internal external rotation . Such shift may result soft tissue adaptation activity demand , reflect structural outcome Humeral retroversion . A shift range motion may detrimental rotator muscle function , may create another risk factor shoulder injury . - The purpose study document shoulder range motion , humeral retroversion , rotator muscle strength fatigue several group overhead athlete undergo routine pre season screen year , investigate interaction factor different group .
DOC.brief_title: Range Motion , Humeral Retroversion Rotator Cuff ( RC ) Muscle Strength Shoulder Overhead Athletes
DOC.detailed_description: At commencement training season athlete receive detailed explanation sign inform concent form . - Upon enrollment athlete fill personal questionnaire , include injury history . This do accordance regular screening perform team . - ROM measure supine position , describe detail work Almeida et al , J shoulder Elbow Surg 2013 , 22 , 602-607 . - Following ROM measurement , assessment Humeral retroversion via Ultrasound carry , describe validated Myers J et al , Am J Sports Med , 2012 , 40 : 1155-1160 . - Strength test commence . A structured warm procedure consist 2 set rotation exercise use Theraband carry . Following pre - set order test consist isometric- isokinetic concentric , isokinetic eccentric testing perform . This order choose order allow maximal physiologic preparation safety test . The first side test determine randomly . - Isometric test carry seat , 90/90 position respect shoulder elbow . This position chosen reflect closely possible functional range dominant shoulder athletic activity . 3 Contractions 3 second , external rotation perform , follow 3 contraction 3 second internal rotation . Both hold stationary pad . - Isokinetic test commence follow familiarization procedure , subject position accord manufacture 's manual protocol describe Zanca et al , J Sports Sciences 2011,29 ( 15 ) :1603-1611 . - Two set perform concentrically , 60 degrees/second 180 deg/second . Eccentric test consist one set utilize slow velocity 60 degrees/sec . - Outcome measure consist total range motion ( TROM ) , difference internal rotation ( GIRD ) , external rotation gain ( ERG ) , Humeral retroversion ( HRT ) - measure degree . Strength measurement consisit maximal isometric strength ( Newton ) , isokinetic peak torque direction ( Newton/Meter ) agonist : antagonist muscle ratios- concentric , eccentric dynamic control ratio ( Eccentric external rotation/concentric internal rotation ) .
